reviewText:
This instructional DVD has been created and designed for Mac Computer Users who would like to make money by selling on eBay.

Step-by-Step visual demonstrations to enable you to create your own eBay auction listings.

eBay Auction photos, PayPal and online shipping are also covered.

This eBay instructional video is geared toward Mac computer novices but "Mac Computer Basics" (also available on Amazon) is a recommended prerequisite.

The author of this program is an experienced eBay seller, computer instructor, and Macintosh User.

Free updates to this program will be posted on the Help for the Computer Shy website.
